pli-tv-pvr8:0.2: Questions and replies regarding the observance day, etc.
pli-tv-pvr8:0.3: 1. Questions on the beginning, the middle, and the end
pli-tv-pvr8:1.1: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the observance-day procedure?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.2: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the invitation procedure?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.3: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of condemnation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.4: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of demotion?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.5: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of banishment?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.6: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of reconciliation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.7: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of ejection?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.8: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of giving probation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.9: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of sending back to the beginning?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.10: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of giving the trial period?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.11: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of rehabilitation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.12: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of an ordination procedure?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.13: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the lifting of a legal procedure of condemnation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.14: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the lifting of a legal procedure of demotion?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.15: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the lifting of a legal procedure of banishment?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.16: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the lifting of a legal procedure of reconciliation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.17: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the lifting of a legal procedure of ejection?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.18: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of resolution through recollection?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.19: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of resolution because of past insanity?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.20: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a further penalty?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.21: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of covering over as if with grass?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.22: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of appointing an instructor of the nuns?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.23: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the permission to stay apart from one’s three robes?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.24: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a blanket-permission?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.25: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of appointing a money discarder?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.26: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of appointing a distributor of rainy-season bathing cloths?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.27: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of appointing a distributor of almsbowls?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.28: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the permission to use a staff?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.29: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the permission to use a carrying-net?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.30: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the permission to use a staff and a carrying-net?
pli-tv-pvr8:2.0: 2. Replies on the beginning, the middle, and the end
pli-tv-pvr8:2.1: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the observance-day procedure?
pli-tv-pvr8:2.2: A complete assembly is the beginning of an observance-day procedure, carrying it out is the middle, and concluding it is the end.
pli-tv-pvr8:3.1: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the invitation procedure?
pli-tv-pvr8:3.2: A complete assembly is the beginning of an invitation procedure, carrying it out is the middle, and concluding it is the end.
pli-tv-pvr8:4.1: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of condemnation?
pli-tv-pvr8:4.2: The action that is the basis for the offense and the person who has done it are the beginning of a procedure of condemnation, the motion is the middle, and the announcement is the end.
pli-tv-pvr8:5.1: … of a legal procedure of demotion …
pli-tv-pvr8:5.2: … of a legal procedure of banishment …
pli-tv-pvr8:5.3: … of a legal procedure of reconciliation …
pli-tv-pvr8:5.4: … of a legal procedure of ejection …
pli-tv-pvr8:5.6: … of sending back to the beginning …
pli-tv-pvr8:5.8: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of rehabilitation?
pli-tv-pvr8:5.9: The action that is the basis for the offense and the person who has done it are the beginning of rehabilitation, the motion is the middle, and the announcement is the end.
pli-tv-pvr8:6.1: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of an ordination procedure?
pli-tv-pvr8:6.2: The person is the beginning of the ordination procedure, the motion is the middle, and the announcement is the end.
pli-tv-pvr8:7.1: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the lifting of a legal procedure of condemnation?
pli-tv-pvr8:7.2: Proper conduct is the beginning of the lifting of a legal procedure of condemnation, the motion is the middle, and the announcement is the end.
pli-tv-pvr8:8.1: … of a legal procedure of demotion …
pli-tv-pvr8:8.2: … of a legal procedure of banishment …
pli-tv-pvr8:8.3: … of a legal procedure of reconciliation …
pli-tv-pvr8:8.4: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the lifting of a legal procedure of ejection?
pli-tv-pvr8:8.5: Proper conduct is the beginning of the lifting of a legal procedure of ejection, the motion is the middle, and the announcement is the end.
pli-tv-pvr8:9.1: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of resolution through recollection?
pli-tv-pvr8:9.2: The action that is the basis for the offense and the person who has done it are the beginning of resolution through recollection, the motion is the middle, and the announcement is the end.
pli-tv-pvr8:10.1: … of resolution because of past insanity …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.3: … of a covering over as if with grass …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.4: … of appointing an instructor of the nuns …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.5: … of the permission to stay apart from one’s three robes …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.8: … of appointing a distributor of rainy-season bathing cloths …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.9: … of appointing a distributor of bowls …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.10: … of the permission to use a staff …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.11: … of the permission to use a carrying-net …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.12: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the permission to use a staff and a carrying-net?
pli-tv-pvr8:10.13: The action that is the basis for the offense and the person who has done it are the beginning of the permission to use a staff and a carrying-net, the motion is the middle, and the announcement is the end.
pli-tv-pvr8:11.1: The questions and replies regarding the observance day, etc., are finished.
